1.name: ARTICLE III. - APPOINTMENT AND REMOVAL OF OFFICERS AND EMPLOYEES; INTEREST OF OFFICIALS IN CONTRACTS
1.label: article

full_text: The officers and employees of the City subject to appointment by the City Manager shall perform such duties as may be required of them by the City Manager, under general regulation of the City Council.

0.text: The officers and employees of the City subject to appointment by the City Manager shall perform such duties as may be required of them by the City Manager, under general regulation of the City Council.

1.name: ARTICLE III. - APPOINTMENT AND REMOVAL OF OFFICERS AND EMPLOYEES; INTEREST OF OFFICIALS IN CONTRACTS
1.label: article

5.catch_line: COUNCIL NOT TO INTERFERE IN APPOINTMENTS OR REMOVALS BY CITY MANAGER.

7.catch_line: BONDS REQUIRED OF OFFICIALS AND EMPLOYEES OF THE CITY.

8.catch_line: REGULATION OF PRIVATE TRANSACTIONS BETWEEN CITY AND ITS OFFICIALS AND EMPLOYEES.

plain_text:
CODE OF STATE

CONTROL OF OFFICERS AND EMPLOYEES. (§ I-III-3.4)

The officers and employees of the City subject to appointment by the City
Manager shall perform such duties as may be required of them by the City
Manager, under general regulation of the City Council.
